reviewText:
This movie is about a male camera-man with two female models flying to Thailand on a business promotion trip.
Brigitte Lahaie is one of these two models.  She is best known in other films as a porn star.  That is why she shows
off her assets to seduce her boss in a hotel room.  Exhibition style.  No real action.
In Thailand, the travel agent acts somehow like a pimp.  He provides hookers as local models.  This camera-man
is foolish enough to fall in love with one of them.  In the end, he finds out the truth.  Immediately, he and his two models
leave the country.  Romance?  Not a bit.
The lighting and foreign postcard scenes are really bad.

A thumbnail plot - a photographer takes 2 models globe-trotting on photoshoots, falls for a Thai prostitute and gets The Thai mob pissed at him, that`s pretty much it. On the other hand, there`s sweet Brigitte Lahaie, looking fab and nude most of the time, the way her fans want to see her. Her scenes are the only reasons to watch - 0 stars for the film, 3 added for Brigitte - if you`re not a fan, avoid this as though it was a DUI checkpoint and you`ve been on a 12 hour Jaegermeister binge...
